herta_space_station.name: Herta Space Station
herta_space_station.description: A massive research station owned by Madam Herta of the Genius Society. Home to countless curios.

jarilo_vi.name: Jarilo-VI
jarilo_vi.description: A frozen planet cut off from the universe for 700 years. The Stellaron was sealed beneath Belobog.

xianzhou_luofu.name: Xianzhou Luofu
xianzhou_luofu.description: One of the six Xianzhou flagships. A massive vessel home to long-lifers who hunt the Abominations of Abundance.

penacony.name: Penacony
penacony.description: The Planet of Festivities - a world where dreams become reality. Ruled by the Oak and Charmony families.

amphoreus.name: Amphoreus
amphoreus.description: A world inspired by Greek mythology. Home to the Remembrance path and the new Trailblazer form.
